SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.protocol.dss

Class DssProtocolHandler

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.AbstractSignServiceHandler
se.swedenconnect.signservice.protocol.dss.DssProtocolHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignServiceHandler, ProtocolHandler
public class DssProtocolHandler extends AbstractSignServiceHandler implements ProtocolHandler
The ProtocolHandler implementation for sign request and response messages according to DSS Extension for Federated Central Signing Services.

    • decodeRequest

      @Nonnull public SignRequestMessage decodeRequest(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws ProtocolException
      Given a message (the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application) and the context the handler decodes the message into a SignRequestMessage instance.

      No validation of the message is performed, other than ensuring that a decode operation is possible.

      Specified by:
      decodeRequest in interface ProtocolHandler
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a SignRequestMessage
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - for decoding errors

    • createSignResponseMessage

      @Nonnull public SignResponseMessage createSignResponseMessage(@Nonnull SignServiceContext context, @Nonnull SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage) throws ProtocolException
      A factory method that creates a SignResponseMessage given the context and the corresponding request message.

      Which parts of the SignResponseMessage that is populated is implementation dependent, but the ProtocolProcessingRequirements of the created object will always be present, i.e., SignRequestMessage.getProcessingRequirements() will be non-null.

      Specified by:
      createSignResponseMessage in interface ProtocolHandler
      Parameters:
      context - the SignService context
      signRequestMessage - the corresponding request message
      Returns:
      a SignResponseMessage
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - if a response message cannot be created

    • encodeResponse

      @Nonnull public HttpResponseAction encodeResponse(@Nonnull SignResponseMessage responseMessage, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws ProtocolException
      Encodes a response message so that it can be returned to the SignService application. The method will create a HttpResponseAction representing the response message as a HTTP request (redirect or post).
      Specified by:
      encodeResponse in interface ProtocolHandler
      Parameters:
      responseMessage - the response message to encode
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a HttpRequestMessage
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - for encoding errors

    • translateError

      @Nonnull public SignResponseResult translateError(@Nonnull SignServiceError error)
      Translates from the generic SignServiceError object to a protocol specific SignResponseResult object.
      Specified by:
      translateError in interface ProtocolHandler
      Parameters:
      error - the error to translate
      Returns:
      a SignResponseResult

    • createSuccessResult

      @Nonnull public SignResponseResult createSuccessResult()
      Creates a SignResponseResult object indicating a successful response.
      Specified by:
      createSuccessResult in interface ProtocolHandler
      Returns:
      a SignResponseResult object
